GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:id.description: serves an object of the specified review_id

review.title: JengARRGGGH!
review.review_body: Few games are equiped to fill a player with such a defined sense of mild-peril, but a friendly game of Jenga will turn the mustn't-make-it-fall anxiety all the way up to 11! Fiddly fun for all the family, this game needs little explaination. Whether you're a player who chooses to play it safe, or one who lives life on the edge, eventually the removal of blocks will destabilise the tower and all your Jenga dreams come tumbling down.

GET /api/reviews/:id/comments.description: serves an array of all review_id associated comments

comments.body: Ex id ipsum dolore non cillum anim sint duis nisi anim deserunt nisi minim.
comments.author: grumpy19

POST /api/reviews/:id/comments.description: adds a comment to the comments table with review_id value as queried. Query string (body) contains a username and a body

PATCH /api/reviews/:id.description: Updates votes count  of a specified review_id (adding or substracting) according to inc_votes query

newReview.title: Culture a Love of Agriculture With Agricola
newReview.review_body: You could sum up Agricola with the simple phrase 'Farmyard Fun' but the mechanics and game play add so much more than that. You'll find yourself torn between breeding pigs, or sowing crops. Its joyeous and rewarding and it makes you think of time spent outside, which is much harder to do these days!

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an array of the specified username

DELETE /api/comments/:commId.description: deletes the comment associated with the request comment_id
